column2: SELECT TOP #   p.objid AS CATID,   p.ra AS RA,   p.dec AS DEC,    (sqrt(power(p.petroR5#_r, #)/p.expAB_r - #*power(psffwhm_r, #))   ) AS Re, -- convert circularised r_e to elliptical, for comparison with GAMA (Kelvin+#)   s.z AS z,   (# + #*(p.ModelMag_g - p.ModelMag_i) -- ModelMag uses consistent aperture     - #*(p.cModelMag_i - #*(log1#(s.z*#/#/#) + #))   ) as Mstar, -- stellar mass from (g-i) colour and i mag (Taylor+#)   p.cModelMag_u AS GAL_MAG_U, -- cModelMag is sum of deVaucouleurs + exponential profiles (https://www.sdss.org/dr1#/algorithms/magnitudes/)   p.cModelMag_g AS GAL_MAG_G,   p.cModelMag_r AS GAL_MAG_R,   p.cModelMag_i AS GAL_MAG_I,   -- surface brightnesses?   p.petroR5#_r + #*log1#(pi*power(p.petroR5#_r, #)) AS GAL_RE_R, -- surface brightness within #re   (#-p.expAB_r) AS Ellipticity_r,   p.fracDeV_r AS fracDeV_r -- in the absence of sersic index, fractional contribution of deVaucouleurs profile to cModelMag   -- or likelihood of deVaucouleurs profile (https://www.sdss.org/dr1#/algorithms/classify/) FROM PhotoObj AS p   JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestobjid = p.objid   -- JOIN PhotoProfile AS pp ON pp.objid = p.objid -- for radial surface brightness profiles WHERE    ((p.type = #) -- galaxy     AND (p.b > # OR p.b < #)      AND (p.dec < #)     AND (s.z > #))
